Title: Relates to a training course and curriculum on the handling, investigation and response procedures concerning reports of domestic violence
Summary: Relates to a training course and curriculum on the handling, investigation and response procedures concerning reports of domestic violence; requires law enforcement and judicial employees to participate in such training; makes related provisions.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the executive law, in relation to a training course and curriculum on the handling, investigation and response procedures concerning reports of domestic violence
